title: 不知道为什么打不开1.12.2
author: xieMgua
txt_content:
这个是日志：Exception in thread "main" java.lang.UnsupportedClassVersionError: net/minecraft/client/main/Main : Unsupported major.minor version 52.0

该怎么解决捏
